column5: First cast   The action wasn't furious, but I did land a couple more nice fish. I like to target as many species as possible each year...Now I can cross largemouth off my list for the year. Next up: Lakers... I hope
It's ridiculous how well white spinnerbaits work on those big largies.
â€¦ and the small ones too.
Nice fish RC!!!!! First cast fish always make the day so much better, at least for me
I notice your location says Nord bay, but I swear 2nd and 3rd shot look like the narrows between K-mog and Soyers Lake lol nice fish regardless of location. And I apologize if i've said too much
This lake is only 20 minutes outside of North Bay.
It's kind of weird to see you holding largies since it's not your usual style Got to love it when they come out to play Great job Chad   Good luck on your laker hunt Jacques

sweet fish there Chad   I really shoudl make a trip out for those -love their energy . Good luck on the laker hunt - and if the opportunity ever permits, make a trip down here  and we'll see if we can't put you on  a few Lake O spring lakers. Just send the PM
Nice fish Chad. Hope you get some lakers.

Absolutely I will!! I'd love to fish out of a real boat someday haha.  Thanks for all the replies guys.  I texted my fishing partner and it looks like we are fishing for pike tomorrow.... maybe lakers next time.
That's a golden reward for your efforts. Nice healthy fish.
Nice fish Chad! Sweet looking walleye too.
